few

[fju; fju:]

He has (very) ~ friends.

(几乎没有)

几个 (some)

one of the ~ relatives (that) she has
她那少数几个亲戚中之一
3 a. 为数不多的,仅少数的
The attendants were ~ (in number).

some few少数的,一些 (的) ,多少有一些
